content:
<rule id="embedded-framework-08500" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="spring-shell-core" groupId="org.springframework.shell"/>
                </project>
            </when>    
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring Shell">
                    <description>The application embeds a Spring Shell library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Shell</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
